item.description:
Please Update your RSVPs since there are now 6 Groups participating in this event and RSVPs will be closed before the day of event due to space limitations.

The Red Sox Natives group has invited our group to join in this meetup. See ALL of the details here:

http://www.meetup.com/natives/events/42845292/

Brief summary copied from Frank's posting -

Owners Lisa and Dan of Harrington's Irish Pub have offerred the Red Sox Natives a section of the first floor bar/restaurant to watch the game. They promised to turn up the volume and provide some light treats to get us started.

"Arrive early at 3:30pm and get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing. Since Harrington's is all Irish the Red Heads get special treatment here. 

Game Time is 4:15pm.

There will be a Holiday twist with some door prizes for lucky Red Sox Natives and guests. You must be there before half time to be eligible.  

There is free parking in downtown Wakefield in the public lot across from Harrington's in front of Bank of America and along Water and Main Streets. The location is T accessible by the 136 and 137 Bus from the Orange Line in Malden Center. And Commuter Rail accessible from North Station (departs 2:45pm) via the Haverhill Train stopping at Wakefield Station (3:08pm) with a less than 10 minute walk up Albion Street, right on to Main Street and 1 block to Water Street. If you are joining us from the City this is the way to go."

There is no cover.

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER AND TIP YOUR SERVERS.

Please RSVP early if you plan to attend.

The following groups are participating:

Red Sox Natives

Wakefield Weeknights

Boston Happy Hour

Social Fun

We hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask Lisa, Dan or the Hostess for the Red Sox Natives reserved section at the bar on the first floor.
item.name: Patriots Holiday Viewing Party - Pats vs Broncos at Harrington's Irish Pub -
